sentence.Network_en: He tells us of lightless stars, " visible " only to radio antennae.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对我们谈起一些不发光的星星, 只有无线电天线才可以 " 看见 ".

sentence.Network_en: Lightless on the sea, our boat was enveloped by the thick darkness.
sentence.Network_cn: 海上没有灯, 浓密的黑暗包围着我们的船.

sentence.Network_en: She walked around in the lightless room.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在黑暗的房间中走来走去.
